title: Security Flaw in Styra's OPA Exposes NTLM Hashes to Remote Attackers
description: Details have emerged about a now-patched security flaw in Styra's Open Policy Agent (OPA) that, if successfully exploited, could have led to leakage of New Technology LAN Manager (NTLM) hashes.
